title: Riot Points Purchasing ERROR
body:
Hey, I have been getting an error every time I attempt to checkout $35.00 worth of Riot Points, I started at 3:00 PM, and my last attempt was 7:00 PM. I do not know why this issue is happening, but I do know that it happens on the Credit Card option, and the PayPal Option.

It would be fantastic if I could get some regard to as what is going on, and when it may be resolved.

The Error message: "You have encountered an error. Please try again later."

replies.body: Ive actually been gettin the same error i just purchased rp in oce and it was fine i also tried doing it on my freind's laptop but its not working help plz :(

Hello GoHomeKidlol,

This error can be pretty annoying, and hopefully we can resolve it easily!  Many errors in the store are actually caused by odd settings in Internet Explorer.  Even if you never, ever use IE, please keep in mind that this program is a dependency for the League of Legends store.

Therefore, in an effort to resolve this issue, make sure that you complete all of the steps in the following Knowledge Base Article:

http://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/20205128-store-error-error-you-have-encountered-an-error-please-try-again-later

I hope this helps!  ^.^  If you are still experiencing this error message, no matter the steps taken in the Article, then make sure that you submit a new Support Ticket to us here in Player Support.  You can do so here:

https://support.leagueoflegends.com/tickets/new
